attributes.action: extend the current sentence from 6 months to 3 years for being involved in Breeding, Training or Fighting 'Pitbull' type dogs. Also a conviction of attending a Dog Fight to carry a minimum 1 year Prison Sentence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the Dangerous Dogs Act was introduced, numbers of the 'Pitbull' type dogs has increased. This is due to these dogs being used as fighting dogs. Extreme cruelty of these animals is universal throughout the Dog Fighting scene and steps must be taken to end this barbaric practice. Many gangs based in most major Cities are making alot of profit from these poor dogs' pain.
